700042f-a.title: Bronx: 135th Street (East) - Lincoln Avenue
700042f-a.text:
East 135th Street, east from (No. 289), but not including Lincoln
Ave., showing the clearance between East 135th and East 134th Streets
which is being constructed into the westerly approach to the Triborough
Bridge. In the background appears the Third Ave. Elevated structure
between Alexander and Willis Aves.
July 29, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

700052f-a.title: Bronx: 135th Street (East) - Lincoln Avenue
700052f-a.text:
East 135th Street (right), west from Lincoln Ave. (foreground),
showing the clearance on both sides of the street which is being con-
atructed into the westerly approach to the Triborough Bridge. In the
background appears the New York Central Railroad bridge across the
Harlem River.
July 29, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
